name: Extreme Commando Training Pro
description:
Extreme Commando Training Pro is a soldier training simulator game. This is a complete shooter, 3rd person soldier & sniper 3d game. There are many addictive and fun filled mission in this 3D commando training game. Complete all the missions for US frontline army training. This is an extreme Para Commando, Self defence & Survival Training, US Marine Solider 3D game.

Follow your commander’s instructions and clear the base. Its an assault army course with basic training. Join the national military guard academy to pass initial special services training in US Army Training School Game.

FEATURES:
- Absolutely Free
- Beautiful, Realistic, 3D Army environment
- Unique training missions
- Full Action packed music and sound effects
- Career mode & Training mode
- Realistic Controls
- Realistic third person animations
- Easy to play
- No Internet required
- No In-App Purchases

JOIN US ON SOCIAL NETWORKS:
